114.content: 1)Wade the adopted son of a village of magical warriors labeled as outcasts for there taboo rituals and magic. Most people fear him for the way he looks and his intense fighting spirit and ability to adapt to any weapon pretty quickly. Frowned upon by most culture in this world for there mentality of death and war. Wade is ready to see the world how will things go for him?
114.title: Who will you pick

choices: Later at the village in the swamp
1141.content:
Blood splatters the ground as a rock cracks over a warrior's head. The warrior hits the ground as his opponent gives a fierce war cry to demonstrate his victory. As the ring of observers grumble a lone figure wearing dark clothing and warpaint approaches. "Suin 'tai wade. You have done well for a dirt warrior. (Suin 'tai traditional greeting of victor of a fight. Dirt warrior: person not pure to the tribe.) You have demonstrated your blood lust and showed that you can defend yourself. Now its time for the tribe to decide your challenge to become a man of the swamp. Who has a befitting challenge for this young prospect?" Angry glares swap from Wade to each other never had a dirt warrior made it to the coming of age ceremony let alone passed it. Now they had to decide what challenge to give to this sub-human. One man steps forward it was the village advisor that had wanted to kill wade at birth, now here to present a challenge."Chief never before has a dirt warrior passed the coming of age ceremony. So i present a new challenge for this dirt warrior. Kill the Monster lord."

"Zalt that is preposterous only a hand full of people have ever killed one, and to top it off the people of the world would never accept him and kill him shortly after."

"That is a possibility but he has demonstrated a first here today let him keep trying his luck at yet another new first for our village."

The tribe could not believe what they had just heard him say but immediately they all had dark smiles as they erupted in cheers. Wade had not said a word through this ordeal. He knew he was hated and that this was a suicide mission, but he would never give a single one of them the satisfaction. That alone was why he fought to break there stereotype of him. Not for there affection but to prove he was better than them in every way. The chief looked at the boy and with a grave look spoke four words. "The Tribe has spoken."
1141.title: Rough start

11411.content: With nothing left in the village you care about leaving was the easiest thing you have ever done. The soon you could prove those pompous ingrates wrong about you the sooner you could make them lick the mud off your boots. Wade cared all that he ever had. The tradition of the village was to make attire that instilled fear into your enemy and to use everything as a weapon. Wade Stood a stout five foot eleven. With a Black White and blood red tipped Dreaded mohawk that came down to about chest length. He Had Tanned white skin. Being the summer months he wore a black Short Sleeve shirt dyed with intrinsic patters of war from his tribe. His pants were baggy for movement but covered in straps, chains and pockets. Everything he wore served a purpose, the down side a lot of it were heavy so it required a sturdy belt. One that he was particularly fond of since it was made from Zalt's horse that he won a few years back. Wade smiled thinking back to the look on Zalt's face when he lost his horse in a bet and found out that he would slaughter his horse for food and make its hide into a belt. Wade loved the insult to injury it gave cause it was a small retribution to the hell he had lived for the past 16 years. His belt buckle was one of the few things that his mother ever gave him of value it was one of great bloodshed the executioners guild. The symbolic cross poleaxes and decapitated head in the center was renowned as people of gore, but like everything he had he made his own. Originally it was a buckle to the pack his Grandfather once wore. Now his belt buckle. His Black mud stained boots were obtained after he killed a rouge attempting to pouch on the little land he had. The boots were simple black mountain warfare boots. On his back he bore a pack he had crafted from deer and alligator hide. It bore his essentials, and finaly slung on his shoulder was his grandfathers ceremonial Executioners Poleaxe. This also was made his own after he broke the haft of the axe. The haft now fashioned together with a dragon spine. The dragon was a small one that was injured in there territory. After killing the dragon of course no dirt warrior was allowed to partake of the meat but left only the stuff no one wanted. He took the spine. "Wont break now'' he said to himself with a wicked smile as his fingered fitted in between the vertebrae of the haft. His boots crunched as he made his way from the swamp to
11411.title: Heading out not looking back

114111.content:
It has been two weeks since he set on this suicidal trek but his determination was unyielding. He refused to stop just cause the past couple of weeks had been filled with isolation. Monster always sought the same thing from them, to fullfil there sexuall urges driven by instinct. The few people had attacked him on the premises of him meaning to do them harm without further cause. They had all met the same fate. He had no desire to kill those that could not last longer than 1 minute against him. As he returned to his camp about a mile from the mountain range he was about to cross. He drops a few rabbits that he had field dressed and began to stuff one with vegitables as put a spit into the meal and placed it over the fire. The other two he would smoke for later meals. Wade was no idiot. He knew that meals would be hard to come by in the mountains and the few that were there were hard to get. As he lay back against a tree he could hear the noise of a large group traveling down the path close to his camp. He readied himself for what was to come. "Hope for the best prepare for the worst." a phrase that held alot of truth to him. He smothered the fire applied war paint and readied his axe. "Two minutes till they get here, better find a good place to attack if it comes to that" he thought. The land was nearly bearin near the foot of the mountains he was already drawing close to the edge of the wood line. His only option was to stay in what little consealment he had and go up in the trees. "Top predators never look up," he thought with a smile. The paint distorted his face in shadows but the design like all things his tribe did was for fear tactics.

A group of lizard men began to come into sight. They were in a shape similar to a wedge, good for all around fighting. The group was about 7-8 people strong all females and all younge. Wade wasn't completely sure of how big the group was less he risk being discovered. The group was heading down the path at a speed faster than any normal human could maintain. As the troop drew near the one in front called the group to a halt. Sniffing the air she began to walk towards you. Wade had never encountered this species before and knew nothing about them. The turned there attention towards your camp as the first one broke into the wood line towards your camp. "Hmm i've never seen them before but theres only 7 of them so cant be to hard to beat them. However i dont know how strong they are and if they have reinforcements near by. Decisions. Decisions." What does he do?
114111.title: Not far into the territory

choices: Announce your presents to the girl see what she does
1141111.content:
From the branch he was observing them from he had the advantage. The old maple he was perched in had thick sturdy branches that wouldn't creek or move to much if he were to change positions. As he looked on he could see the group growing impatient. They were shifting around a lot and starting to look annoyed.

"Slyth do you see anything or not?"said a smaller lizard girl of the group. "If you make us fail this exam because you think you saw something i'm gonna flog you"

"Well she's obviously the brains of the group" thought wade. The girl now know as Slyth had a flash of panic on her face, turned around and was heading back to the way she came. "Y-yeah I'm coming, I thought I .....Hey yall get over here!" she cried looking over at the remains of your smothered fire and half cooked rabbits. The group tore throught the woods from the path they had originally been on to see what there comrade had found, with the sole exception of the smaller lizard girl. "Shes bluffing like she always does to get attention." yelled the girl. "Shut up Carndra, we've found a campsite. We may have found one." Carndra now focused gave a shout "Clover formation like we practiced. Spread out and find them and be careful there may be more than one." As if on cue all the girls pulled out there swords.

Wade tensed up now aware that he had been discovered was readying himself for the attack. The girls began to fan out circling around the campsite looking for the intruder i.e. wade. You stay perched waiting for your chance to start picking them off one by one. Guerrilla warfare was by far your least favorite way to attack but it was a safe bet on a enemy you knew nothing about. "What do you think the reward will be for catching one?" said a girl that had not talked before. "No idea but its gonna be worth it" another girl says with a laugh. "Quite we still don't know where they are." cried Carndra. Through all the chaos you had already slipped out of your perch and heading to the first girl who was snooping around your campsite. You...
1141111.title: Tree top

1142.content:
The city-state of Unihaven. This (fan fictional) nation is the most unique first off by being the only nation on both the human world and demon realm. Second off, it is unique for being a nation of massive walls and gates that let anyone enter. Third off, it is a neutral nation in the battles between humans and monster girls, so both races get the chance to stay here freely and equally.

Would you like to follow this story, starting with it's history? Or would you want to get straight into the story?
1142.title: The City-State of Unihaven

11421.content:
Years ago, before a lone succubus became the new dark lord, there was a long war. The Seven Sin Crusade is what it became called later in time. The reason for the name was because there were seven sides to the war. Six different human nations and religions against each others and the monsters. The Crusade lasted for years, until the final battle on the border. It was the moment before the new Dark Lord came to be was when the battle ended and the Border Wasteland was made.
Since that battle, it was decided that the Crusade would be more of a cold war. But many pacifist humans saw the war as pointless. A small group of these people, the Universal Haven League, was formed. They chose to be truly neutral with the six nations and religions imploding on civil war and the Dark Lords slow change of monsters into monster girls so that the two races could unite to create a new race to be 'taking too long'. But the League was small, made up of 20 humans and only hold small lands in the Border Wasteland.
The League did grow, but with the growing power, they had to flee from their home nations that they've been citizens of for so long to keep from the treason punishment. When they all moved to their new homes, the Universal Haven League became Unihaven League. A former general in the war, Anton Tristan, was chosen to lead the people. By this time, he knew that there was no way an actual nation could come forth, so he settled on a city state. He died of old age 40 years later, when the city of Unihaven was built.
The city was divided into multiple districts. But the center-most district was named Tristan in honor of the general. The city hardly expanded much to not cause conflict with the other nations. Tristan's son and successor, Robert, was adamant about this plan. But Robert wanted to keep Unihaven truly neutral, he never allowed the gates to his massive walls be allowed open for fear of attack on 'the legacy of traitors'. But 5 years into Robert's rule, famine, plague, and pestilence. So Robert did an unpopular forced labor of farmers, miners, doctors, and exterminators.
However, most of the work was wasted because of the infertile land and weak workers. This became the Unihaven Famine Crisis. Robert slowly began to lose trust in his people, and several of his associates were preparing the Brutus Coup, lead by his adviser Brutus. Robert was left no choice and decided to open the doors of the city-state and humans and monster girls (Mamono) started pouring in by the hundreds daily. But Unihaven was still adamant about neutrality.
Robert himself turned the numbers from hundreds to thousands when he made a passionate speech about how he got the plague himself and would die soon and his son, Daniel, would be his heir and want peace for his son and city when he's gone. Weeks later, Robert passed away. By this time, statues were made in honor of him and several others. Now the city is a site for people who want peace to live in, tourists to visit, and travelers to pass through. Since then, peace seemed easier.
Today, Unihaven is one of the most prosperous nations in the world. It is just as stable as the Human Nations and Monster Realm. The city is inhabited in districts by both Mamono and humans. There are districts designed for the Mamono, but don't affect humans to become an incubus. And since the opening of doors, the city has tripled in size by mostly farmland. The Border Wasteland became the Unihaven Border Farmlands. Would you like to know the Destricts?
11421.title: Nation History

114211.content:
District 1: Frieden District, A half in half district known for it's markets
District 2: Liebe District, A district mostly for Mamono, closest district to the demon realm, known for many marriages
District 3: Kirche District, A district for the most religious of humans. Has all six of the religions
District 4: Held District, A district for adventurers and wizards. This district is near the Shivered Sea
District 5: Bauernhof District, A half in half district made for mostly farmers
District 6: Tristan District, oldest district. Has multiple Burroughs, like New Lancaster of the humans. Has many festivals.

Burrough 1: Tochter Burrough, made for the Mamono
Burrough 2: Musik Burrough, known for it's culture and center of most festival
Burrough 3: Geld Burrough, known for housing some of the richest people in the nation
Burrough 4: Heilig Burrough, known for having the religion and where people like the pope stay when visiting
Burrough 5: Hauptstadt Burrough, home of Daniel Tristan and the city hall

Would you like to start the story now by choosing where the hero lives?
114211.title: Districts of Unihaven

I actually like my current life of getting a horse and doing pick up for supplies around the district and head to the bustling market and drop off the supplies for my dad. I like my horse, Argo, and I don't want to have to retire her yet. I then get Argo ready for work and arrive at the first stop, where I know there's a girl I like working there...

Their daughter is a cute girl with purple hair and good breasts. Her name is Hilary. She's always nice to me and my family. I try to talk to her some, but I have to get to the market with the milk very quickly. After work, I find Hilary again and...

11423.content: My name is Qroa (pronounced Crow). I was born in the north on a series of islands called the Stormy Islands. My father is Haek (pronounced Hawk), he is a farmer, but he is actually a retired knight who served in the ancient crusades. My mother is Swin (Pronounced Swan), she is the daughter of this merchant in the village, but she was in love with my father. When my father went to war, she found out she was pregnant with me. She was terrified about how father would react, but he took it great and proposed to her. When I was four, my sister Duv (Pronounced Dove) was born. She she is very hyperactive and likes adventures. Five years later, my brother Ski (pronounced Sky) was born. He is extremely shy and timid. He chose to much rather help mother with her chores. But me, I wanted to go around the world and write down my experiences. So I told my parents this wish. They understood and I went with a journal, a pencil, food, sleeping bags, clothes, imperial gold, and a sword to deal with brigands. I was eighteen years old when I left the islands that were home. My first stop was...

Brown messy hair, blue eyes and comma shaped birthmark on right shoulder.

1151.content:
"Are you sure?" "Yeah Elder I'm sure" you brush your hair out of your eyes while heaving your bag onto your shoulders.

"Well I can't stop you, but I wish you would stay, it's not safe out there" "Hah! that's exactly why I'm going." You take his outstretched hand "good luck and remember you will always have a home here" "aww c'mon don't be so cliche! Don't worry once I'm awesome I'll come back for a visit"

You wave once before you walk out of the village and into the forest.

1151.title: Gosune Jakka

1152.content:
18 years old

Dark hair, blue eyes, and scar just above the left side of his eye.

Raised by a kind fortune teller who took him as his assisstant and estranged son for 7 years. He sees life differently than most, often seeing the good in others when they can't see it in themselves.

He travels around hoping to spread his wisdom to those in need of it. He is skilled only in illusion magic and can conjure personal visions of people's darkest memories. He also weild a concealed gadget that holds a hidden blade to stab his foes.
1152.title: Gavvin Wake

choices: And he fell asleep on the large tree
11521.content:
It's a quiet day as Gavvin journeyed across the forest looking to find the nearest settlement. Even though he was one to avoid conflict he still held up his guard, since the forest held many species of monster women. He readied his illusion magic in case anyone attacked him.

But soon he began to grow tired as he had been walking for miles and hasn't had time to catch his breath. He did not feel safe with having to rest in the forest but he had no other choice. He placed his belongings by a large tree. And then was about to rest on it. But then a wonderful smell caught his attention.

It was most enticing and he was curious as to where it was coming from. But then he thought for a moment and believed it was a trick by a nearby monster. He began to take his things but then the scent grew more intoxicating. He lost his common sense and felt commpelled to follow it.

But his exhaustion was great and he was barley standing...
11521.title: Yes

115212.content:
Gavvin fell asleep next to the tree. But unknown to him he was sleeping near a dryad. Soon enough the creature awoke from her sleep to find Gavvin resting on her very roots in the ground. Her name was Saria and had lived for a full century making her tree one of the tallest in the forest. It helped to hide her from any travelers who hunted and when she was enticing men to her liking.

She used her tree branches to pick Gavvin up which caused him to wakeup. He found that both his arms were entangled by the branches and couldn't move. He then gazed upon the dryad in her beauty. Hair as yellow as the sun, skin tann as a tree, and eyes green as grass.

"Hello young travler.", she spoke. "Speak your name."

"Gavvin Wake. And you are?"

"Saria."

"Are you planning to keep me here indefinatley?"

"That depends. Why were you on my tree?"

"I was passing through when I felt tired and slept on your tree. I am not a hunter so please believe me when I say I come in peace."

"No hunter sleeps on a tree. I will give you the benefit of the doubt."

"I only wish to catch my breath until I can travel again. Will you let me stay here in your care Saria? "

Saria thought about it and looked at Gavvin. He was quite good looking and was very compassionate given the circumstances. She then agreed to watching over him except, "You can only rest with me on top of the tree."

"What? Uh, fine but can I you release my arms?"

"My tree will still bind your body but yes I shall release them. If you stay bound longer than 6 hours then you and I will share this tree's life together. "

"I take it if the tree is attacked and killed, you die as well, hence the precaution."

"Handsome and smart. A pair not aquired by most.", she flirted by stroking his chin.

Gavvin then laid on Saria's lap resting himself. Saria then began thinking of mating with him later since she began to fall for him rather quickly. Until he regained his strength she would advance on him.
115212.title: And he fell asleep on the large tree

1152121.content:
Gavvin woke up feeling refreshed. He streched out his arms but found Saria looking at him with lust. She came near him and rode her fingers down his arm. Gavvin was unsure of her intention but to his surprise she pulled him in for a kiss. He felt the rush of euphoria in his body and the feeling was intoxicating. Saria intended to have sex with Gavvin and would have him permenantly connected to her tree.

Through her kiss were traces of pheromones that made Gavvin want her and make him easy prey. She broke the kiss with Gavvin breathing in the pheromones. He tried to think straight but it was too hard for him. Saria undressed herself and let Gavvin feel her breasts. He was starting to return her affection but he was reminded of why he was cautious in the first place when he tried to move his legs.

If he succumbed to her charms he would have to stay with her forever. He then took out a hidden knife and took it to Saria's neck. "I know what your doing and refuse to be forced into marrying a dryad."

"Forgive me but it's just my nature. Having you here meant I could have a husband. If you wish to leave then go. But if you do want to stay with me and it's your choice, then let me make love to you."

Gavvin pulled the knife away from her neck and she awaited his choice. If he wasn't forced to become part of her tree would he spend the rest of his life with her? She was at least kind enough to give him a choice in the matter showing her compassion. But was it a life he wanted now?
1152121.title: Later

choices: A lamia girl that looks hungry.
A Succubus with a wicked grin.
A imp with a playfulyet evil  smile.
122.content:
Mary was a young and kind girl who loved to play and sing. She never sang around others as she was shy but her voice was beautiful. Birds would sing along and animals would join her as she sang. The only thing she loved more than singing was her mom and dad. They were traders and should weapons to heroes who would fight against the many monster girls of the world. One day they went out to a nearby city to buy some metal and iron for a custom sword. They never came back.

Mary was forced to live with her loving ant who even though treated her well, she missed her mom and dad. 5 years past and on her 12th birthday she grabbed some of her families light armor and a knife and left her home town to find her long lost parents. At 12 years old her body was already mature. She had long legs and a thin, tone body. good sized breast for a girl her age and she dressed to show it all off even if she was shy. Long black hair and blue eyes and a childish face made everyone fall in love with her. Even her ass was fit, round and tone and very sexy.

With nothing but a sword, light armor, and little food she ran out to try to find her mom and dad.....

"I hope I'm going the right way?" Mary asked herself as she looked over a map she took from her ant.

Not a day had past and she was already lost. She thought she could just follow the path and get to the city but now she was heading the wrong way. She flipped over the map and turned it around more than a few times and hour passed before she realized just how lost she was.

"Well I guess I have to turn around and try again tomorrow." She said a little sad but still determined.

"Oh a little girl? And a cute one too... Perfect." Said a wicked voice from behind her.

"Wh... Who are you?" Mary asked to scared to turn around.

"Don't worry... I'll take good care of you... I've been looking for a sex toy for a while now and you are just my type."

Mart turned around and drew her sword ready for a fight. No way she could win but maybe she could scare the monster away. As she turned she saw the monster was a.....
122.title: Mary

125.content:
From the day Rose was born she had been filled with a passion for exploration. When she was little her parents would read her bedtime stories. Most of them were about heroes going on a adventure in distant far away lands, finding amazing treasures along the way. Her favorite stories had to be about the lost city of Neula. It is said that treasure lies within its ruins. She became inspired to become a pathfinder herself when she grew up.

From that day forward she wanted to make a name for by finding it. The world outside her small town is dangerous, as a result most people see leaving as either brave or stupid. At first her parents tried to talk her out of it but she wanted freedom. Reluctantly they gave in. They gave her a wooden club leather backpack, basic supplies, a map and hoped that she wouldn't be too reckless.

Free at last she set out on her journey she decided to go to the capital. From there she could join the pathfinders. Maybe they might have some clues about where the lost city could be but along the way she runs into a ....
